name: sp
description:
The spectral transform library splib contains FORTRAN subprograms to be
used for a variety of spectral transform functions.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependent_to.name: ip2
dependent_to.description:
The NCEP general interpolation library 2 (ip2lib) contains Fortran 90
subprograms to be used for interpolating between nearly all grids used
at NCEP.

dependent_to.name: wgrib2
dependent_to.description:
The wgrib2 package functionality for interacting with, reading, writing,
and manipulating GRIB2 files.

dependent_to.name: ip
dependent_to.description:
The NCEP general interpolation library (iplib) contains Fortran 90
subprograms to be used for interpolating between nearly all grids used
at NCEP.

dependent_to.name: ufs-utils
dependent_to.description:
The UFS Utilities package contains programs set up the model grid and
create coldstart initial conditions.

dependent_to.name: ncep-post
dependent_to.description:
The NCEP Post Processor is a software package designed to generate
useful products from raw model output.

dependent_to.name: ufs-weather-model
dependent_to.description:
The Unified Forecast System (UFS) Weather Model (WM) is a prognostic
model that can be used for short- and medium-range research and
operational forecasts, as exemplified by its use in the operational
Global Forecast System (GFS) of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric
Administration (NOAA).
